code: import React from"react";import{NavBar}from'./navbar.js';import{Footer}from'./footer.js';import'./assets/styles/404.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{isThemeSet}from'./choose_theme';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const isLightTheme=isThemeSet();export function Login(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{id:isLightTheme?'loginMainLight':'loginMain',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/createaccount",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Don't have an account yet? Sign Up"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}function LoginForm(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{id:isLightTheme?'loginFormLight':"loginForm",action:"/connect",method:"POST",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"username",children:" Username "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"username",children:" Password "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:isLightTheme?"creationSubmitBtnLight":"creationSubmitBtn",type:"submit",children:"Login"})]})});}export async function isLogged(){const database=await fetch('http://localhost:8081/database',{method:'GET',headers:{'Cookie':'db_password=strongpassword'}});const cookies=document.cookie;let cookieFound=cookies.split(';').find(el=>el.trim().split('=')[0]==="session_id");let session_id;if(cookieFound)session_id=cookieFound.split("=")[1];console.log(database);if(!database["sessions"])return undefined;return database["sessions"][session_id];}
